attributes.action: Set up a publicly accessible web site which will contain all MP's names, political party and expenses claimed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been proved yet again that “some” MP’s just cannot be trusted to work for the benefit of the country – a publicly accessible web site which will contain all MP's names, political party and expenses claimed would enable the public to vote for the MP’s they trust

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
